name: Lacework FortiCNAPP > Create FortiSOAR alert from Lacework FortiCNAPP Alert
description: Creates a FortiSOAR alert from a Lacework FortiCNAPP alert

resource.name: {{vars.item.alertId}}:{{vars.item.alertName}}
{{vars.item.alertId}}:{{vars.item.alertName}}
{{vars.item.alertId}}:{{vars.item.alertName}}
resource.iPAddresses: {% set ip_addresses=[] %}{% for machine in vars.item.azure_machines %}{% if "InternalIp" in machine.PROPS.tags %}{% if ip_addresses.append(machine.PROPS.tags.InternalIp) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% if "ExternalIp" in machine.PROPS.tags %}{% if ip_addresses.append(machine.PROPS.tags.ExternalIp) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ ip_addresses }}

resource.name: {{vars.item.alertId}}:{{vars.item.alertName}}
resource.iPAddresses: {% set ip_addresses=[] %}{% for machine in vars.item.gcp_machines %}{% if "InternalIp" in machine.PROPS.tags %}{% if ip_addresses.append(machine.PROPS.tags.InternalIp) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% if "ExternalIp" in machine.PROPS.tags %}{% if ip_addresses.append(machine.PROPS.tags.ExternalIp) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ ip_addresses }}

arguments.aws:
{% set items=[] %}
{% for item in vars.steps.Machines %}{% if item.machines | length > 0 %}{% if items.append(1) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ items | length > 0 }}
arguments.gcp:
{% set items=[] %}
{% for item in vars.steps.Machines %}{% if item.gcp_machines | length > 0 %}{% if items.append(1) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ items | length > 0 }}
arguments.azure:
{% set items=[] %}
{% for item in vars.steps.Machines %}{% if item.azure_machines | length > 0 %}{% if items.append(1) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ items | length > 0 }}
arguments.aws_users:
{% set items=[] %}
{% for item in vars.steps.Machines %}{% if item.users | length > 0 %}{% if items.append(1) %}{% endif %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{ items | length > 0 }}

arguments.subject: {{ vars.item.data.data.alertInfo.subject }}

routes.name: AWS Users -> Copy of Create AWS Record
Create AWS User Record -> Set Result

groups.name: Create FortiSOAR  Alert from Lacework Composite Machine Alert
